body.name: JIEMEI HOME Kitchen Utensil Holder, 7.2" Large Ceramic Stable Utensil Crock for Kitchen Counter, Utensil Holder with Cork Mat, Removable Bamboo Divider for Easy, Kitchen Decor and Accessories, White

features: Unique Design: The kitchen utensil holder has a ridged textured design,it looks just modern & elegant standing on your kitchen counter,can match many household style and make a beautiful decoration for your kitchen countertop and home.

Large & Deep Utensil Holder: 6.5" L * 6.5" W * 7.3" H hence enough space for storage, 10 to 15 pieces of common utensils can easily go into it, make utensils organized and easy to find, give you a neat and tidy kitchen.

Cork Mat & Removable Divider:A non-slip cork mat attached at the bottom prevents your table or countertop from scratching,prevents slipping.With a removable divider to store various cooking utensils such as spatulas, ladles, spoons, tongs, whisks, knives, chopsticks, cutlery, masher, fork, and more.

Stable & Durable Utensil Crock: Unlike common metal or stainless steel utensil holders, this ceramic kitchen utensil holder is heavy and stable, avoiding utensils from falling and spilling all over the kitchen.

Multiple Function: This utensil crock could be used for anything you want to display, such as kitchen utensils, spatula holder, cool wine, potted plants or a bouquet, office, and craft tools.Also it is a wonderful and elegant gift choice.
body.description: JH JIEMEIHOME Utensil Holder Keep Your Kitchen Tidy and Novel: A convenient solution for overflowing kitchen drawers and counter top clutter. Classic but not dull Style Kitchen Decor: Not just your ordinary utensil crock! The basic shape with elegant stripes and removable bamboo divider utensil holder is classic style adds a certain uniqueness and novelty to your kitchen. Large size for spatulas, spoons, cutlery, whisks, etc. Made of premium porcelain, safe & durable Table-protection Cork Pad on the Bottom Removable Bamboo Divider Multiple uses, can use as vase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wanted an upgrade to my previous utensil holder. This one is very good quality and incredibly spacious. Came with a cute note thanking us for the purchase. Perfect addition to our counter!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE - This is a beautiful, sturdy ceramic large cooking utensil holder.
reviews.reviewText: LOVE LOVE LOVE - This is a beautiful, sturdy glazed ceramic large utensil holder for all my cooking tools. Soft cream color matches my cabinets perfectly! Easy to clean and it even has rubber pads on the bottom to keep it steady and from possibly scratching the Granite.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s big and beautiful. I wish it came with a matching set of containers for coffee and sugar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love- strong, sturdy, beautiful
reviews.reviewText: This is a SOLID piece that (I believe) could go with any decor. It’s durable, heavy, well made, stunning in person. Textured and durable. Buy buy buy, would be good as a plant holder, vase, utensil holder, etc., the wooden separator is removable. Great purchase, highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Heavy enough so that it does not knock over easily
reviews.reviewText: Utensil Holder Kitchen Large Ceramic Utensils Crock for Countertop Table, Heavy Porcelain Farmhouse Utensil Holders Non slip Anti-scratch No Wobbling, Easy to Clean, Blue -JH JIEMEI HOMENo matter how organized your kitchen is, you always seem to end up with a handful of utensils that you use so often oh, that they end up living on the counter rather than put away in a drawer somewhere. That's where a utensil holder like this one comes in handy, in fact, I would consider it a must. I was a little apprehensive at trying a porcelain utensil holder at first, I've got a metal one that I've used for years, and it has had its fair share of abuse. After seeing and using this porcelain crock for my commonly used stovetop tools, I'm not worried about it anymore. Physically it's heavy enough so that it doesn't tip over if you grab a spoon or something out of it when you're in a hurry. It's not too heavy to move around the counter, but it's heavy enough that it stays put. it's big enough you can get a lot of different utensils into it. I recently started using some of the new stoneware coated pans, and I am trying to be vigilant about not scratching them with utensils, so I'm using this utensil holder for just my nonscratch utensils - bamboo, silicone, etc. I've been using this one for a month or so, and I'm pretty happy with it. If you're in the market for a utensil holder and you like the design of this one, I would say go for it. It's good looking enough that you don't mind sitting on the counter all the time, and it does a good job holding all of your stovetop tools inside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This item is better than expected! I love the quality and look of this piece. It fits in with my MCM/Modern theme of my kitchen. I’m so happy I purchased this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Utensil Holder
reviews.reviewText: I purchased to green and gold color swatch, it looks exactly as pictured. It was wider than I was expecting, but that’s nice as it gives you more storage room. The wooden divider can be removed if you don’t want/need it or to help with cleaning the inside. Would recommend, very beautiful and functional piece.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just as described and even prettier in person. Feels very well made and the anti-slip cork on the bottom is a nice touch.
